description: Create a responsive job portal dashboard using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern UI patterns. Focus on performance, accessibility, and clean component architecture.
Design and implement a RESTful API using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to support user authentication, job posting, and application workflows.
Implement an efficient candidate-to-job matching algorithm based on skills, experience, and preferences. Provide time complexity analysis and test cases.
Redesign the UI/UX of a career-focused web platform. Submit Figma designs along with design rationale focusing on usability and user psychology.
